3️⃣. Millions of working Americans could lose Medicaid coverage, and the Healthy Michigan Plan would end as we know it.
2️⃣. More than 137 million Americans (including those with employer coverage) could have to pay for preventive care—like flu shots, cancer screenings & mammograms.

1️⃣. 156 million Americans who get coverage through their jobs could face coverage caps. Insurance companies could limit how much their policies have to pay each year or over a lifetime, leaving people with potentially millions of dollars of medical bills.

If the Republican-backed lawsuit attacking our health care law is successful, it could raise costs for Michigan workers & their families.
